definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: As to the 3rd, have to count roundlet desk to go up that " antependium " .
sentences.chinese: 至於第三嘛，就得數小圓桌上的那塊“桌布”了。

sentences.english: She spread a table-cloth over the table.
He was so busy clocking her that he spilt a glass of beer over the table-cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他只顧目不轉睛地盯着她，竟把一杯啤酒灑在桌布上。

sentences.english: STAIN】The tablecloth is stained where food has been spilled.
sentences.chinese: 在食物灑出的地方，桌布被弄髒了。

sentences.english: They sit down at a table which is covered with snow-white tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 他們在一張桌旁坐下，桌布雪白。

sentences.english: I'm afraid Ispilled coffee on the tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我把咖啡溢到桌布上了。

sentences.english: The tablecloth is stained where food has been spilled.
sentences.chinese: 在食物灑出的地方，桌布被弄髒了。

sentences.english: There's a nasty mark on the tablecloth , and I don't think the usual washing powder will take it out.
sentences.chinese: 桌布上有一塊污跡，我想用普通洗衣粉是洗不掉的。

sentences.english: He set it down carefully on the baize cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他小心翼翼地把它放在粗呢桌布上。

sentences.english: Mother always smoothes out the table-cloth after each meal.
sentences.chinese: 每頓飯飯後母親總是把桌布布鋪平。

sentences.english: A sovereign fell, Bright and new, on the soft pile of the tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 一枚金鎊，鋥亮而嶄新，落在厚實柔軟的桌布上。

sentences.english: I am dreadfully sorry, but I am afraid I have spill ink all over the table cloth.
sentences.chinese: 太對不起了，我把桌布全潑上了墨水。

sentences.english: The children unpacks food and drinks, piling catered delicacy over a stone tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們把訂製的食物和飲料都堆在石桌布上。

sentences.english: Wash an ink stain out of the tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 潑翻的墨水把桌布染成藍色。

sentences.english: He knocked over a bottle of ink and ruined the table cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他打翻了一瓶墨水吧桌布弄髒了。

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
